Welcome to *Hill Country Internal Medicine & Weight Loss.*

At Hill Country Internal Medicine & Weight Loss, we offer a comprehensive range of specialized services tailored to support your long-term health and well-being.

*Internal Medicine & Chronic Disease Management:* Diagnosis and treatment of conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, and high cholesterol through evidence-based, personalized care.

*Obesity Medicine & Medical Weight Loss:* Medically supervised weight loss solutions addressing metabolic and hormonal factors behind obesity.

*FibroScanÂ® Liver Health Assessments:* Non-invasive, accurate insights into liver stiffness and fat content, detecting early signs of liver disease.

*Sleep Studies & Sleep Disorder Management:* Diagnose and treat sleep apnea and insomniaâ€”key to metabolic and cardiovascular health.

*Testosterone Replacement Therapy (TRT):* For men experiencing low testosterone symptoms, helping restore vitality and hormonal balance safely.
